title: Weekly Troop Meeting
description: Regular troop meeting. Wear Class A uniforms. Bring your handbook and any completed requirements.

title: Winter Camping Trip
description: Weekend winter camping trip. Bring your cold-weather gear, Class B uniforms, and a positive attitude! Parents are welcome to join.

title: Community Service: Food Drive
description: Help organize and distribute food for those in need. Wear Class B uniforms and bring a reusable water bottle.

title: Merit Badge Workshop
description: Work on merit badges with guest instructors. Bring your merit badge worksheets and any required materials.

title: Eagle Scout Court of Honor
description: Celebrate the achievements of our newest Eagle Scouts. Families and friends are welcome. Dress formally.

title: Spring Camp Planning Meeting
description: Planning meeting for the upcoming spring camp. Parents and scouts should attend to discuss logistics and preparations.

title: Spring Camping Adventure
description: Spring camping trip with hiking, fishing, and outdoor skills training. Bring your camping gear and Class B uniforms.

title: Scout-O-Rama
description: Annual Scout-O-Rama event! Showcase scouting skills and participate in fun activities. Open to the public.

title: Memorial Day Flag Placement
description: Honor fallen heroes by placing flags at their gravesites. Wear Class A uniforms and bring work gloves.

title: Summer Camp Prep Meeting
description: Final meeting to prepare for summer camp. Parents and scouts must attend to review packing lists and schedules.

title: Summer Camp
description: Week-long summer camp with activities like swimming, archery, and merit badge classes. Bring all required gear and a positive attitude!

title: 4th of July Parade
description: March in the annual 4th of July parade. Wear Class A uniforms and bring plenty of water.
